title: Strictly Come Dancing's Katya Jones suffers fall during Mike Bushell dance
text:
Katya actually styled this out really well#Strictly pic.twitter.com/sxdzaQdtxs — Joel Gleicher (@JoelG_88) October 5, 2019

Strictly Come Dancing’s Katya Jones suffered every dancer’s worst nightmare as she suffered a dramatic fall during her dance with Mike Bushell.

The star was performing a raunchy dance to The Weather Girls’ It’s Raining Men with the journalist but it seems one move went just a little (a lot) wrong.

After a lovely spin and following Mike across the studio, Katya dropped to the floor – with some fans assuming Mike was meant to be there to catch her.

Bit awkward.

‘It wasn’t quite magic, it was nearly tragic in parts,’ judge Bruno Tonioli asserted, with Katya insisting: ‘It wasn’t his fault!’

Clearly a little unsteady, she fell again at the top of the stairs, with Claudia Winkleman worriedly asking if she was okay.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Katya actually styled this out really well,’ one fan wrote, with another adding: ‘WAIT did Katya just fall over.’

However, tweeting after the performance, Katya insisted the second fall was staged as she denied being ‘drunk.’

‘Guys! I’m totally fine! No idea what happened. So sorry . But so proud of @mikebreakfast for carrying on and delivering “the dolphin”!’ she wrote.

FYI I did it again on purpose in Claudia’s area! And im def not drunk as some people think. — katya Jones (@Mrs_katjones) October 5, 2019

The star added: ‘FYI I did it again on purpose in Claudia’s area! And im def not drunk as some people think.’

Mike and Katya, who seem to have been taking no prisoners in their rehearsals, scored 22 for their dance, which saw the journalist sliding down a fireman’s pole before ripping off the uniform to reveal his glittery outfit.

Peak Strictly and we love it.

Katya insisted it wasn’t Mike’s fault (Picture: BBC)

It’s not the first time viewers have been glued to his routine, after they spotted him eating a banana completely wrong in his week two dance.

The BBC Breakfast presenter had an actual banana in his pocket during his American Smooth. And that wasn’t even the strangest moment of the dance.

The 53-year-old then proceeded to chomp down on the fruit – sideways.

We’re not sure what’s going on in the slightest, but we’re obsessed.

Strictly Come Dancing returns Sunday at 7.15 on BBC One.

description: Strictly Come Dancing's Katya Jones suffers two dramatic falls during Mike Bushell routine.
